text: You have fallen low, without anyway out, your lord looks away from your fruitless battles, as he regrets even allowing this to even occur.
Another roadblock hits you, and your chance back to your glory, fades away ever so faster.
You have stumbled back, your armies have been beaten back, but at least there is a way back to your former glory.
Many factions are looking at your land with greed in their eyes, each of their foolish decisions only bring opportunity to you.
War seems to be on the horizons or is it already? Either way, you must prepare for each foolish attempt at an assault and defence.
Each battles is trivial, each battle ends with your glowing success, but you mustn't let it get to your head, for one flaw will draw all down onto you.
Your land is well protected, your army are well cared for, all is well. Do not become too complacent, or your lands will fall like the Han.
Without proper planning, many things can go wrong.
